viewData.name: Samsung MU7500 65" Class HDR UHD Smart Curved LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung MU7500 65" Class HDR UHD Smart Curved LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 Curved LED Panel, HDR10 Support Motion Rate 120 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung MU7500
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung MU7500 65" Class HDR UHD Smart Curved LED TV. This TV has a 65" LED-backlit curved LCD display, and incorporates Motion Rate 120 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. The MU7500 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content via the Samsung Smart Hub, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With three HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
